metadata.title: RZ/V2L: Execution error happen when running DRP-AI sample application

sections.content:
Question:
Sample Application (e.g. app_tinyyolov2_cam) included in DRP-AI Support Package does not work and output error message below.
[ERROR] Failed to initialize Camera.
Answer:
When apply RZ/V2L ISP Support Package after applying RZ/V2L DRP-AI Support Package to RZ/V2L Linux Package, some of sample applications in RZ/V2L DRP-AI Support Package become unusable. Please refere following document for more detail.
https://www.renesas.com/document/oth/rzv2l-isp-support-package-note-caution
Suitable Products
RZ/V2L

Sample Application (e.g. app_tinyyolov2_cam) included in DRP-AI Support Package does not work and output error message below.
[ERROR] Failed to initialize Camera.
